divs: sighting detailsdriving with husband on i-80 east near central ave exit in el cerrito, ca. freeway faces north\east. 9:46 pm or so - night time. entire horizon\ sky flashed blue light on horizon in direction we were driving - entire horizon. we both witnessed it.
Summary: ENTIRE HORIZON FLASH OF BLUE LIGHT
